Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell-based (SOFC) power generation plant is analyzed with a view to performance as well as thermo-mechanical stresses.
Titulo: Transient system-level performance and thermo-mechanical stress analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell-based power generation plant with a multi-physics approach

Sentencas: Emphasis is given to design and operation constraints of individual components as well as control-relevant aspects.
Titulo: Transient system-level performance and thermo-mechanical stress analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell-based power generation plant with a multi-physics approach

Sentencas: We use a multi-physics modeling approach for simulations in design and off-design (part-load) under steady-state and transient conditions.
Titulo: Transient system-level performance and thermo-mechanical stress analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell-based power generation plant with a multi-physics approach

Sentencas: Simulations confirm that the temperature distribution plays a pivotal role.
Titulo: Transient system-level performance and thermo-mechanical stress analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell-based power generation plant with a multi-physics approach

Sentencas: For the SOFC the electrolyte is exposed to higher stresses compared to those in the electrodes.
Titulo: Transient system-level performance and thermo-mechanical stress analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell-based power generation plant with a multi-physics approach

Sentencas: Disturbances in operation, e.g. in terms of current extraction, should be avoided because of resulting temperature excursions.
Titulo: Transient system-level performance and thermo-mechanical stress analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell-based power generation plant with a multi-physics approach

Sentencas: This systems engineering perspective in which performance, durability issues and control aspects are combined, provides additional insights on a system level of practical relevance.
Titulo: Transient system-level performance and thermo-mechanical stress analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell-based power generation plant with a multi-physics approach
